tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Images (
    image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_url TEXT NOT NULL,
    image_description TEXT,
    asset_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES GameAssets(asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Videos (
    video_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    video_url TEXT NOT NULL,
    video_duration INT,
    asset_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES GameAssets(asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE game_assets (
    asset_id SERIAL,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255),
    asset_type VARCHAR(50),
    asset_path TEXT,
    creation_date TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE images (
    image_id SERIAL,
    image_name VARCHAR(255),
    image_size INT,
    image_resolution VARCHAR(50),
    asset_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (image_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES game_assets (asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE videos (
    video_id SERIAL,
    video_name VARCHAR(255),
    video_duration TIME,
    video_quality VARCHAR(50),
    asset_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (video_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES game_assets (asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sound_files (
    sound_id SERIAL,
    sound_name VARCHAR(255),
    sound_duration TIME,
    sound_type VARCHAR(50),
    asset_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (sound_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES game_assets (asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DeveloperAssets (
    developer_id INT,
    asset_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (developer_id) REFERENCES GameDevelopers(developer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES GameAssets(asset_id),
    PRIMARY KEY (developer_id, asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE GameReviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id INT,
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    review_rating INT CHECK (review_rating >= 1 AND review_rating <= 5),
    review_comment TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES GameAssets(asset_id)
);
